description.lang: The DSC IoTega WS900-29 Self-Contained Wireless Security System provides an integrated solution for fire and security monitoring and home automation in a small footprint but reach in features and benefits. The IoTega is an easy to use, all-in-one wireless security panel optimized for use with home automation systems. The alarm panel supports a range of wireless devices via PowerG or Z-Wave. Installers set up and configure the panel through a smartphone app and cloud-based portal. End users also interact with the IoTega using an intuitive smartphone app or optional touchscreen keypad.

deviceDescription.productName: Wireless Alarm System with Integrated Home Automation

description.lang: Z-Wave Plus LifelineThe DUT uses this group to send alarm panel status updates to associated nodes.
